entries.@plc_vdream_brandon_c4: Hold <font color='#209DD6'>%use%</font> to place the bomb
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_01:
[Trans_req] All right, people. It's time to figure out what these goddamn dreams mean, and why they keep bothering us.
Our science team have developed this shared consciousness simulation, so that we as Immunes could explore these dreams together. Let's look around.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_02: [Trans_req] So, it wants us to pick a dream? Huh! Can this shit get any weirder? Your choice, people!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_03:
[Trans_req] I'll be damned if I got any clue out of that one! Are we supposed to… what, kill Kioni?
Huh, I'd love to hear what the doc has to say about it… On to the next dream now, shall we?
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_04:
[Trans_req] This is ridiculous! I know my son. He would never side with those lunatics willingly!
This whole thing is nothing but a bad trip! Okay, let's give it another shot. See what that next 'dream' is about!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_kioni_01: [Trans_req] And what do you hope to achieve?
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_kioni_02: [Trans_req] What is your plan? Kill all Glassheads? How do you see winning this?
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_05: [Trans_req] Mhm… this looks like the place where we got Kioni. Apparently, this Echo thing wants to show us something we missed. Let's play along.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_06: [Trans_req] Okay, so the floor is lava. Literally. Make sure to have something solid to stand on.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_kioni_03: [Trans_req] So confident. So self-righteous. How can you not realize that the world you are trying to save is already gone?
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_07: [Trans_req] Damn it, girl! I told you before, and I'll tell you again: we will not stop until we eradicate the Crystalline. Period.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_kioni_04: [Trans_req] Eradicate? And how do you plan to do that, exactly? How does one eradicate an ocean? Can you vaporize all the water?
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_08:
[Trans_req] Our scientists will find a remedy against this goddamn plague!
And we will deliver it to every last sprout on the planet if we have to!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_kioni_05: [Trans_req] You should really ask yourselves, Shellguard. Are you saving the world, or simply prolonging its agony?
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_09:
[Trans_req] Don’t mind her, people! None of this is real anyway.
We need to enter that city hall and figure out the nature of those experiments.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_kioni_06:
[Trans_req] Don't you see? Fighting the glass is pointless. It is the part of our world now.
Like air, soil, and water. But embracing it. Harnessing its power. This is where we can yet succeed!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_10: [Trans_req] What the… They come in purple now? Haven't seen this kind before, have we?
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_kioni_07: [Trans_req] Admit it, Immunes! You are the past, and we are the future!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_11: [Trans_req] Oh, would you shut the hell up already! Team, destroy that goddamn capsule! Now!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_12: [Trans_req] See all those hoses and tubes? The Strafers clearly did something to the girl. We gotta figure out what it was!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_kioni_08: [Trans_req] Your ignorance will be your downfall!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_phillips_13: [Trans_req] Halfway there, team! Keep at it!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_01: [Trans_req] So here you are, intruding my dream. Or is it yours? Doesn't matter, really. Alright then, picture this if you will.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_02: [Trans_req] Things went clusterfuck, fast. We lost comms, then Bill, then Lucy and Kevin. Riding through hell with zero chance to drive on.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_03: [Trans_req] Fuck! Try get to that dish and pop smoke!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_041: Requesting Exfil! Backup! Something! Balls to the wall! Commander! Dad! What the…
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_05: [Trans_req] Long story short. We got to Al Saaha.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_06: [Trans_req] Bravo is over that corner, push forward!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_07: [Trans_req] This… was when it all went down.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_hero1_01: [Trans_req] Fuck! The bin is shelled, we are out of anything!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_08: [Trans_req] They were all dead. All but me…
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_seer_01:
[Trans_req] What have we here? A wayward soul. Devoid of family.
Longing for a home. Come, child. You will not be left for dead here. Not by me.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_051:
[Trans_req] The further we pushed, the weirder shit got… At this point, we weren't afraid to die.
But in the eyes of every Glasshead we killed, we saw fate worse than death.
And that fate… was terrifying.
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_071: [Trans_req] See that sprout? It's charging the fucking turrets! Blow it up, now!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_072: [Trans_req] Careful! Brittle glass on the roof!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_073: [Trans_req] Damn it! Gate is stuck! Move that vehicle out of the way!
entries.@subtitles_pve_vdream_brandon_074: [Trans_req] Beacon's online, clear signal! Hold your ground, folks! Cavalry's coming!
